body_html:
@lukeyeager I based it on django-unchained.

If pytorch.org adds an element:

<div class="pip-install-pytorch">...</div>

with css:

#pip-install-pytorch {
    display: none;
}

#pip-install-pytorch:target {
    display: block;
}

It will show that div when pip install pytorch launches the pytorch.org website.
